Package com.lonepulse.robozombie.request

Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which create requests and process requests for a proxy invocation using the annotated meta-data found on the endpoint definition.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Interceptor This contract defines the policy for intercepting a request and processing it just before it's submitted for execution.
Serializer<INPUT,OUTPUT> This contract defines the policy of a serializer which is responsible for translating a model into a content-type suitable for network transmission.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSerializer<INPUT,OUTPUT> An abstract implementation of Serializer which directs serialization for all Serializers.
PlainSerializer An AbstractSerializer which simply invokes String#valueOf(...) on a model.
RequestProcessorChain This is a concrete implementation of AbstractProcessorChain which creates a sequentially executed series of AbstractRequestProcessors responsible for building the HttpRequestBase for a request invocation.
 

Enum Summary
Serializers Exposes all available AbstractSerializers, resolves concrete instances of their serializer types and mediates communication.
 

Package com.lonepulse.robozombie.request Description

Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which create requests and process requests for a proxy invocation using the annotated meta-data found on the endpoint definition.

Since:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe
